name: Le petit chaperon gris
description:
A small girl wants to bring pies & jelly to her friendly granny... Or does she?
After finding herself lost on an unfamiliar path, she now seeks for her own home.

Controls:
Walk: ←↑↓→/WASD/Left Stick
Pause: Enter/Return/Start
Use/Select: Space/A/Cross
Run: Shift/Left Stick/B/Circle

A game by Loupystudio software:
Eloded: 3D models, concept, pixel-art, music
Loupyboy: code, level design, concept, music
Vonlow: Main menu art
